keyMoments.title: Luffy's Faith in His Crew
keyMoments.description: Despite Lucci's taunts about the fate of his crew and friends, Luffy declares his unwavering faith in them, believing they will all survive and escape together.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Luffy's growth as a captain and his deep trust in his nakama, showing that his strength comes from believing in his crew.
keyMoments.quote: I believe in them! They'll all make it out alive!

keyMoments.title: Gear Third Activation
keyMoments.description: Luffy activates Gear Third for the first time in the series, biting into his thumb and inflating his bones with air using the Bone Balloon (Hone Fusen) technique.
keyMoments.significance: Marks the debut of one of Luffy's most iconic power-ups, representing his evolution as a fighter and willingness to push his body to its limits to protect his crew.
keyMoments.quote: If I can't win, I can't protect anyone! Gear... Third!

keyMoments.title: Gomu Gomu no Gigant Pistol
keyMoments.description: Luffy unleashes his first Gear Third attack, the Gomu Gomu no Gigant Pistol, inflating his arm to gigantic proportions and overwhelming Lucci's Tekkai defense.
keyMoments.significance: First demonstration of Gear Third's devastating power in combat, proving Luffy can now produce attacks with the strength of a giant.

abilities.description: Luffy bites his thumb and blows air directly into his bones, inflating them to gigantic proportions. This gives his attacks the power and size of a giant, though at the cost of speed and with a shrinking side effect afterward.
The foundational technique of Gear Third where Luffy inflates his skeleton by blowing air into his bones through his thumb.
Luffy's first Gear Third attack where he inflates his arm to giant size and delivers a devastating punch with tremendous force and range.

reveals.information: Luffy can inflate his bones to create giant-sized attacks through Gear Third
Luffy has absolute faith in his crew's ability to survive and escape, even when he cannot see or help them

keyMoments.title: Robin Recalls Ohara's Destruction
keyMoments.description: Witnessing the Buster Call decimating Enies Lobby, Robin falls to her knees and recalls the traumatic destruction of her homeland Ohara by the same devastating military operation twenty years ago.
keyMoments.significance: Deepens Robin's trauma and shows how the Buster Call has haunted her entire life, reinforcing why she feared bringing this danger to the Straw Hats.
keyMoments.quote: This is just like that day... when Ohara was destroyed...

keyMoments.title: Robin Prepares to Fight for Freedom
keyMoments.description: Freed from her Sea Prism Stone handcuffs, Robin stands with Franky on the Bridge of Hesitation, preparing to fight through the Marines to reach the escape ships.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Robin's growth in choosing to fight for her freedom alongside allies rather than running alone, demonstrating her acceptance of the Straw Hats' protection.

reveals.information: Robin's PTSD is triggered by witnessing the Buster Call, as it mirrors the destruction of Ohara that traumatized her as a child
Robin chooses to fight alongside Franky instead of fleeing alone, showing her acceptance of having allies

keyMoments.title: Lucci Floods Column with Seawater
keyMoments.description: Lucci uses his Rankyaku technique to rupture the wall and flood the Tower of Justice's column and underground tunnels with seawater, creating a tactical advantage.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Lucci's strategic thinking and ruthless efficiency, using the environment to threaten both Luffy and the escaping crew below.

keyMoments.title: Lucci Overwhelmed by Gigant Pistol
keyMoments.description: Despite using his Iron Body (Tekkai) defense, Lucci is overwhelmed by Luffy's Gomu Gomu no Gigant Pistol and sent flying from the Tower to a Buster Call battleship.
keyMoments.significance: First time Lucci's Rokushiki mastery proves insufficient against Luffy's new technique, showing the game-changing power of Gear Third.

keyMoments.title: Franky Prepares to Fight with Robin
keyMoments.description: On the Bridge of Hesitation, Franky stands with Robin preparing to fight their way past Spandam and the Marines to reach the escape ships.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Franky's commitment to helping Robin escape and his role as an ally to the Straw Hats.

keyMoments.title: Sogeking Lands Safely at Tower Base
keyMoments.description: As Sogeking, Usopp falls from the struck section of the Tower of Justice but safely lands at the base where Zoro and Sanji are located.
keyMoments.significance: Reunites Sogeking with other crew members, keeping the escape team together for their journey through the underground tunnels.
